name: Vincci Maritimo Barcelona

reviews.title: Not bad for a 4 star hotel!!!
reviews.text: I was on my honeymoon and i simply love this hotel.. It is so near to the beach and the metro train to the town.
I would definitely recommend to my friends!!!
reviews.title: A Great Stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Better than last year

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Three of us stayed here for a week of vacation and had a great stay. It's a very convenient location with subway access to the rest of the city close by. A nice new building, clean and accessible. The only issue we had was with a concierge service that was at times friendly and helpful, and at other times rushed, short, and busy. But, I definitely recommend this for vacationers willing to be just outside the city center. We had a wonderful time.
reviews.title: Great new hotel

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel last year and found it most agreeable. The standard of accommodation is excellent.The location is ideal for those who don't want to be in the busy city yet it only takes 30 mins to get there from the hotel by metro which is so easy to do. The nearest stop is selva de mar which is just around the corner, the reception staff will be happy to direct you. You can buy a ticket for 10 journeys which costs at present time 7.20 euros. If the ticket office is closed use the self service machine. You can chose your language and then you pick a T10 ticket its so easy. We only used 1 ticket each in 5 days.
reviews.title: Nice hotel shame about the ironing!

reviews.text: We were staying in this hotel in the end of August. Impressions of hotel are not the best. There were badly working bath and WC. The reservation was made on expanded double room, but really it seemed like standard one. By the check-out time I had found out that the TV costs 25 euros even if I wasn’t watching any extra TV channel. We didn't use the TV at all. I was using only internet. It costs 9 euro per day. I did not manage to find the pool. The way to the city centre by public transport takes about 30 minutes. If your aim is to see sightseeing of the city you should take some of the hotels in the center of BCN.
reviews.title: Not so good as i hoped

likes.liked: — Cost of parking. 16 euro per day.

reviews.text: Have used this hotel several times on business trips. Very clean, stylish and modern. A bit lacking in atmosphere. Good location for Diagonal Mar shopping mall but too far out of the centre for me to consider it if on vacation.
reviews.title: Vincci Maritimo style
Nice hotel but more out of the way than expected
reviews.text: I booked this hotel based on reviews written on Tripadvisor. It was only a two night stay before embarking on a cruise. The port was nearby and the cab ride wasn't more than 15 minutes ( I believe) from the hotel. The front desk isn't much, just a small desk with 1 person sitting there, behind glass I believe (sorry I'm trying to recollect the details; the trip was a while ago).

The staff was friendly enough. What I'd wish I knew was that the hotel was pretty far from Las Ramblas. I wanted to be closer to the busier part of Barcelona. It was at least a 10-15 min cab ride there, which was ok, but I wanted to be closer.
reviews.title: Not the best nights sleep

reviews.text: I liked the room's decor and the comfort of the bed. The bathroom was great. I especially liked the shower in there; really nice and the water pressure was great. What I wish I brought was a universal adapter for the plugs. When I visited Europe before, my hotel provided one, but as I've learned, most don't do this. Bring your own or you'll have bad hair days every day, I assure you! What I didn't like about the hotel was that there was an abandoned building right across the street. That was minor though; it wasn't like it was unsafe, the building just looked out of place and kinda creepy there, but really no big deal.
reviews.title: OK but not great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my wife stayed at the Vincci for two days. It was a beautiful experience. The location is excellent. Close to the beach and the Diagnol Mar Mall. Only drawback is .. no Metro stop closeby and so we had to take a bus to move around Barcelona. Overall a great experience at a great price.
reviews.title: Comfort and Style together!

likes.liked: — Stylish architecture and close to the mall

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: when we were there the metro was under construction. check it before you go.
reviews.title: wonderful hotel but

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the location is good and quiet and there is a parking space for free near by, so don't use the hotel parking.
reviews.title: great hotel, wrong place.

likes.liked: — The staff, they were really good
likes.disliked: — Location, too far from the centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: also it is close to the beach.
reviews.title: Class Hotel Awesom City

reviews.text: the room is beutiful and comfortable.
reviews.title: Loved the shower

likes.disliked: — The disused building opposite the hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked to stay at this hotel in early February for my birthday weekend, and were slightly worried about some of the negative reviews regarding location.....please, please, please ignore those comments! The hotel is two minutes walk from the tube station, and you're in La Ramblas in 12 minutes. We got two "three day" passes on the underground, costing 30euros in total, and it was brilliant.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Great Value, Great Trip

likes.liked: — Clean, friendly staff, price, buffet breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You can get all over the city with that ticket, and it runs until 2am Friday / Saturday, and 12midnight other days. True, if you want to party until 4am, then you'll have to pay 10euros in a cab, but again, that's nothing compared to what you'll have spent!
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel, would definitely stay there again!!

likes.disliked: — 10 mins walk to the beach, could have been closer??

reviews.text: Brilliant staff, great breakfast (plenty to choose from for everyone), and really helpful reception check in / out, cab to airport etc, everything brilliant.
reviews.title: Loved Vincci

reviews.text: next time I'm in Barceona I'll stay. Forget about getting ripped of on those tatty hotels on La Ramblas....stay here and enjoy a really nice hotel at a great price (300 euros for three nights)
reviews.title: Nice hotel, not so nice of a location

reviews.text: This hotel was clean and visually very attractive. The facilities were great and kept in good order. The service was great. The buffet breakfast was excellent, had a great range of food and planty of it. Would definitely re-visit and recommend it to family and friends.
reviews.title: Minimal and Hip

description: Offering an impressive sea view and next to the new Conference Palace (CCIB), Vincci Maritimo Hotel is located in the new district of Barcelona.Only a few miles from Mar-Bella Beach its all-round glass-front brings the light in to create a unique effect on the architecture and deco.Every bedroom offers plenty of space and natural daylight.The Hotel´s meeting rooms are the ideal place for business lunches and other events. And after a long work day, unwind in our Japanese garden.
